about_the_game:
Adventure of the Bucket is a cooperative multiplayer game for two players that can be enjoyed locally. Jump into a unique world where two distinct characters, the Iron Bucket and the Wooden Bucket, are connected by a single spring. Experience the innovative gameplay as you stretch and launch the spring to solve stages. Ready to take on the challenge alone? You can control both buckets and play solo!

  • Local Co-op Multiplayer: Team up with a friend and solve puzzles to complete stages together. Each player controls a different bucket, requiring perfect teamwork to succeed.

  • Single Player: Face the challenge on your own! One player can control both buckets simultaneously.

  • Innovative Gameplay: The two buckets are connected by a spring, allowing you to explore stages, overcome obstacles, and solve puzzles using this unique mechanic. Use your creativity to conquer a variety of stages!

  • Diverse Stages: Each stage presents unique mechanics for you to tackle. The constantly changing environments and clever obstacles will challenge your strategic thinking.

  • Cute Graphics and Charming Soundtrack: With bright and lively visuals, the adorable bucket characters will make your adventure even more enjoyable. The charming soundtrack enhances the immersive experience of the game.
